textBox.richText: With 8” snow monday night, 6” tuesday night, and then another 4” wednesday, we got enough coverage to open up a bunch more terrain. Gunter and I started on Belle, and when the Cirque opened, we headed there! No sled (LAME!!!), but we ended up doing the hike twice. First lap was down Playing Field to the South Basin...only one set of tracks in front of us there.
